data.title: Postal Zip Codes (postcode) for Barisal District – Amardesh
data.text:

Postal Zip Codes (postcode) for Barisal District

Postal Zip Codes (postcode) for Barisal District

Thana/Upazila within Barisal District are: Agailzhara, Babuganj, Barajalia, Barisal Sadar, Gouranadi, Mahendiganj, Muladi, Sahebganj. The following table contains post codes of various sub post office in Barisal district.

Agailzhara 8240 Gaila 8241 Paisarhat 8242
